title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, with a total of 4 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 2018 to 2015.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2018.
gold: This statistic shows the average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the United States from 2015 to 2018 . Average sales per Outback Steakhouse restaurant amounted to approximately 3.58 million U.S. dollars in 2018 .
